dc_description_s: This line shapefile represents roads in Saint Helena. The Global Map St Helena Island version 2 Drainage, Transportation and Population Centres layer were developed from the 1989, 1: 10,000 Ordance Survey map at a scale of 1: 10,000. The Global Map St Helena Island version 2: Boundary layer was developed at scale of 1:25,000 on the 12/12/2005 and from the 1989, 1:10,000 Ordance Survey map at a scale of 1:25,000.Global Map data were developed under the cooperation of National Geospatial Information Authorities (NGIAs) of respective countries and regions.
dc_publisher_s: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
dc_creator_sm: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
